text:
Hey all… just following up on HubDB and HS CLI documentation.
I ran `hs help hubdb` and got back
```Usage: hs hubdb [options] [command]```
with some other helpful snippets. But still had questions
In digging through hubdb json data, I was wondering if the new richtext features enablement works there too?
… I’ve tried out `create`, `delete` and `fetch` and they work beautifully. I was wondering if there is an `update` function?
What do u mean checking the json data?
If you send the foramtted rich text data via the api, it will work.. I am not sure if thats what your question
I was wondering if adding <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields/rich-text-editor|these options> to the rt column would be possible at some point

Hey John, the RTE options above are only for the Rich text fields in custom modules through local development at the moment. It wouldn’t apply to the RTE in HubDB.
cc <@UA7JFQSQ0> <@U8THBCFC4>
Yeah, we’re looking at expanding the configuration capabilities further (maybe into default rich text) in the future, but it’ll probably be a bit more long term
